name: timezone
description: Get the list of available timezone to be used in the races endpoint.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: seasons
description: Get all seasons available. All seasons are only 4-digit keys. All results can be used in other endpoints as filters.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: circuits
description: Get the list of available circuits.

name.description: The name of the circuit, eg: 'Melbourne Grand Prix Circuit'.

search.description: Allow to search for a circuit name, eg: search='Melbourne'.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: competition
description: Get the list of available competitions.

name.description: The name of the competition, eg: name='Australian Grand Prix'.

country.description: The name of the country, eg: country='Australia'.

city.description: The name of the city, eg: city='Melbourne'.

search.description: Allow to search for a competition name, eg: search='Australian'.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: drivers
description: Get the list of available drivers.

name.description: The name of the driver, eg: name='Lewis Hamilton'.

search.description: Allow to search for a driver name, eg: search='lewi'.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: races
description: Get the list of available races for a competition.

season.description: The season of the league, eg: 2019

type.description: The type of the race, enum: ['Race', 'Sprint', '1st Qualifying', '2nd Qualifying', '3rd Qualifying', '1st Practice', '2nd Practice', '3rd Practice']

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: drivers
description: Get the list of available teams.

name.description: The name of the team, eg: name='Red Bull Racing'.

search.description: Allow to search for a team name, eg: search='Red bull'.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: pit_stops
description: Get the list of pit stops made by all drivers during a race.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: rankings_drivers
description: Get the drivers rankings for a season.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: rankings_races
description: Get the rankings for a race.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
